description: This file defines a Flutter widget called `BudgetGaugeChart` that displays a radial gauge indicating budget utilization. It uses the `fl_chart` package to render a pie chart illustrating the percentage of spent budget versus remaining, with an overlay displaying percentage text and a label.

classes.name: BudgetGaugeChart
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that shows a radial gauge for visualizing budget utilization, indicating how much has been spent relative to the budgeted amount.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the `BudgetGaugeChart`, rendering a pie chart with overlayed percentage text.
